Title: Little Nicholas
Writer: Laurent Tirard (screenplay), Grégoire Vigneron (screenplay), Laurent Tirard (dialogue), Grégoire Vigneron (dialogue), Alain Chabat (dialogue), René Goscinny (characters), Jean-Jacques Sempé (characters)
Actors: Maxime Godart, Vincent Claude, Charles Vaillant, Victor Carles
Plot: Nicholas has every reason to keep things in life unchanged; however, when he accidentally overhears mum and dad talking about a new baby brother, his world will turn upside down. Will they abandon him to make room for the little stranger?
